summary: Collection of bugfixes for skyrims sound
descriptionHtml:
This mod is a sideproject of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39977]Project Soundscape[/url].
The bugfix-file of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35957]Reverb and Sound[/url] is outdated. Please use this version.


It fixes bugs with skyrims sound/sound implementation. By bugs i mean things that are obviously broken. I don\'t want to add these to a sound overhaul that is focussed on subjective design changes. In my opinion these belong into a bugfix mod, so i reported them to the uskp-bugtracker and and additionally release them here for people who don\'t want to use the uskp.

*For now the Uskp is no complete replacement for this mod, due to the fact that i takes time for them to check on and fix these issues.

Note: I\'m not related to the Uskp in any way, nor do i prefer it over other mods. It\'s just the only \"all in one\" bugfix project i know of..




[size=6][color=DarkOrange][b]Content[/b][/color][/size]

[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Skyrim[/b][/color][/size]
[list]
[*] Fixed not working bell-sound of domestic goats. The bell around their neck is supposed to make sound.
[*] Added the missing player sounds for jumping up. Before jump up sounds in 3rdperson didn\'t properly switch to HRTF (instead they were played \"in the players head\") as well as npc jump-sounds were not played on HRTF. Sound categorys (volume-sliders) are fixed too.  [color=yellow]Soundscape[/color]
[*] Added missing FireballExplosion-sound to the Explosion-records that only used FireballExplosionDistant instead of both. For example the fireball-spell only played the distant sound on impact.
[*] Fixed frosbite spiders using the footsteps of giant frostbite spiders. This is the reason why spider-footsteps are always to loud... [color=green]*Fixed in USKP 1.3.3[/color]
[*] Fixed Elks using Horse-Footsteps. [color=green]*Fixed in USKP 2.0[/color]
[*] Fixed missing Draugr combat-voices. [color=yellow]Soundscape[/color]
[*] Fixed wrong samples on random mountain wind-gust b. [color=yellow]Soundscape[/color]
[/list]

[size=3][color=DarkOrange][b]Dragonborn[/b][/color][/size]
[list]
[*] Fixed Sound Marker AmbHarbor01 using banner sound. In front of the abandoned building in raven rock a banner sound could be heard before.   [color=green]*Fixed in UDBP 1.0.4[/color]
[/list]

[color=green]green[/color] - included in the USKP
[color=yellow]yellow[/color] - also fixed by Project Soundscape





[size=5][color=DarkOrange][b]Load Order[/b][/color][/size]
Load close the the uskp/early in the load order. This will allow other mods to overwrite the changes if necessary.
If using my sound overhaul, load the bugfix-files before the modules!

[size=5][color=DarkOrange][b]Compatibility[/b][/color][/size]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25859]Tes5Edit[/url] is your best friend!

[size=5][color=DarkOrange][b]Installation/Uninstallation[/b][/color][/size]
Use favorite mod manager to install or copy plugins manually to skyrim/data. Activate the dragonborn file only if you have dragonborn..
To uninstall use the mod manager or delete the files.




[size=5][color=DarkOrange][b]Recommended Fixes[/b][/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10175]SkyTEST - Dawnguard Wolf Sound Fix[/url] - It\'s one of the optional files of SkyTEST. Fixes the missing wolf howl and other wolf sounds.
